statements: DELETE FROM inventory_levels WHERE product_id = 101 AND category = 'Electronics';
DELETE FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock < optimal_stock OR product_name = 'Laptops';
DELETE FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_quantity < min_quantity_threshold;
DELETE FROM sustainable_food_products WHERE id = 100 AND product_category = 'organic';
DELETE FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_quantity < min_quantity_threshold OR max_quantity_threshold = 1000;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE product_id = 100 AND quantity > 10;
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE product_id = (SELECT product_id FROM products WHERE product_name = 'Apples' AND product_category = 'Fruits');
